subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Hambletonian (Harness Race)
Retirement
lead_paragraph: After winning 22 of 25 races, placing in two others, and showing once, Deweycheatumnhowe will soon be sent to a farm in Lexington, Ky., for his new life as a stud.
snippet: After winning 22 of 25 races, placing in two others, and showing once, Deweycheatumnhowe will soon be sent to a farm in Lexington, Ky., for his new life as a stud.
